name: Panic Toast
description:
Welcome to PANIC TOAST!

This is my first entirely 3D game made in unity, I hope you'll like it.

The mechanics are very simple, the controls are the following:

TOAST: It's the player. Move it on the table by pressing "WASD" keys.

JAM: They are your enemies, you must avoid them!

BUTTER: Grab it and use it to shoot  jams with directional arrows (↑ ↓ → ←). On screen top-right you can see how many butters you have . No more then 1 butter at a time is on the table and the next appears only after you have grabbed it.

TOASTER: Consider it as the only friend you have in this game. It spawns every 30 seconds. When colliding it, the toast flies for a couple of seconds and if lots of jam jars are on the table, the toaster will remove a few.
